title: Contact Us
body:
## Get in touch

We’d love to hear from you. The best way to get in touch is to send us a message below.

We receive a huge volume of emails and we do read every single one. Because we’re a small team, we can’t always respond to everyone – but we’ll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible!

If you are a member of the media, please email [media@getup.org.au](mailto:media@getup.org.au).

@[freshdesk:{"title":"","submit_label":"Submit Message","submit_thanks":"Thanks for reaching out! We will get to your message as soon as possible."}]
